[File: aptos-core/storage/aptosdb/src/state_store/state_merkle_batch_committer.rs] [Function: run()] [Cache-commit race] Can cache eviction during cache.maybe_evict_version() race with concurrent merkle node commits, evicting nodes that are actively being written? (High)

[File: aptos-core/storage/aptosdb/src/state_store/state_merkle_batch_committer.rs] [Function: run()] [Crash recovery] If the validator crashes during state_merkle_db.commit() after partial shard writes, can it recover on restart or will it have corrupted merkle tree state? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/storage/aptosdb/src/state_store/state_merkle_batch_committer.rs] [Function: run()] [Dependency poisoning] Can malicious dependencies in state_db, persisted_state, or PrunerManager cause security violations in the commit flow without being detected? (High)

[File: aptos-core/storage/aptosdb/src/state_store/state_merkle_batch_committer.rs] [Function: run()] [Time-of-check-time-of-use] Is there a TOCTOU vulnerability between check_usage_consistency() validation and persisted_state.set() where state can be modified maliciously? (High)
